citrus_collection.name: Orange Burst
citrus_collection.description: Start your day with our signature Valencia orange blend, packed with natural vitamin C and vibrant citrus flavor.

citrus_collection.name: Lemon Ginger Zing
citrus_collection.description: Refreshing lemon juice meets invigorating fresh ginger for the perfect digestive wellness drink.

citrus_collection.name: Grapefruit Mint
citrus_collection.description: Tart pink grapefruit balanced with cooling fresh mint creates the perfect metabolism-boosting refresher.

tropical_blend.name: Pineapple Paradise
tropical_blend.description: Transport yourself to the tropics with sweet pineapple and coconut water for natural electrolyte replenishment.

tropical_blend.name: Mango Passion
tropical_blend.description: Rich Alphonso mangoes blended with passion fruit create this exotic, vitamin-rich tropical treat.

berry_power.name: Mixed Berry Blast
berry_power.description: A superfood blend of seasonal berries packed with antioxidants and natural sweetness.

berry_power.name: Cranberry Apple
berry_power.description: Tart cranberries meet sweet Honeycrisp apples in this perfectly balanced, urinary health-supporting blend.

green_goodness.name: Green Goddess
green_goodness.description: Our signature green blend combines nutrient-dense vegetables and fruits for the ultimate detox experience.

green_goodness.name: Cucumber Mint Cooler
green_goodness.description: Ultra-hydrating cucumber with refreshing mint creates the perfect low-calorie, cooling beverage.

wellness_shots.name: Carrot Ginger Wellness
wellness_shots.description: Earthy carrots with warming ginger and turmeric create this anti-inflammatory wellness shot.
